		<string>CustomPrompt</string>
		<key>Text</key>
		<string><!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<title>Macro Repository Updater</title>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">

		<!-- ======== Top and Client =============================== -->
		<style type="text/css">
			body {
				overflow: hidden;
				font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
				font-size: 14px;
				text-align: center;
				margin: 0;
				background: #ececec;
			}

			#tblPleaseWait {

				_width = 550;
				_height = 146;
				document.body.style.width = _width + "px";
				document.body.style.height = _height + 'px';

				// center on the screen
				_left = ((window.screen.availWidth - _width) / 2) + window.screen.availLeft;
				_top = ((window.screen.availHeight - _height) / 2) + window.screen.availTop;

				if (_inDevMode) {
					setTimeout(function() {
						showCompleted();
					}, 4000);
				}

				return _left + ", " + _top + ", " + _width + ", " + _height;
			}

			function showCompleted() {
				document.getElementById("tblPleaseWait").toggleClass("hidden", true);
				document.getElementById("tblCompleted").toggleClass("hidden", false);
				var widthAdj = 60;
				var width = _width - (widthAdj * 2);
				document.body.style.width = width + "px";
				window.KeyboardMaestro.ResizeWindow((_left + widthAdj) + ", " + _top + ", " + width + ", " + (_height - 40));
				_completed = true;
			}
		</script>

	<body data-kmwindowid="MacroRepositoryPleaseWaitScreen">
		<table id="tblPleaseWait">
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divPleaseWaitMessage" >
						Please Wait while the Macro Repository is updated...
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divAni" >
						<img id="ani" src="data:image/gif;" />
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table>
		<table id="tblCompleted" class="hidden">
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divCompletedMessage" >
						Finished!
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divOkButton" >
						<a id="btnOK" class="okButton" onclick="window.KeyboardMaestro.Cancel('Cancel')">OK</a>
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table>
	</body>

</html></string>
		<key>TimeOutAbortsMacro</key>
		<true/>
		<key>UseText</key>
		<true/>
</dict>

Actions.ActionName: Show the Custom HTML Prompt asynchronously
Actions.Text: tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set _script to getvariable "macrep_PleaseWaitDialog"	ignoring application responses		do script _script	end ignoringend tell
